38 namespace TiledArray {
39 
40 template <typename Tile>
41 elem::DistMatrix<typename Tile::value_type> array_to_elem(
42  const DistArray<Tile>& array, const elem::Grid& grid) {
43  // Check that the Array is 2-d
44  TA_USER_ASSERT(array.range().rank() == 2u,
45  "TiledArray::array_to_elem(): The array dimension must be 2.");
46 
47  // Construct the elemental matrix
48  using T = typename Tile::value_type;
49  auto sizes = array.trange().elements_range().extent_data();
50  elem::DistMatrix<T> mat(sizes[0], sizes[1], grid);
51  elem::Zero(mat);
52 
53  // Create the Axpy interface to fill elemental matrix
54  elem::AxpyInterface<T> interface;
55  // Attach matrix to interface
56  interface.Attach(elem::LOCAL_TO_GLOBAL, mat);
57 
58  // Get array iterators
59  typename DistArray<Tile>::const_iterator it = array.begin();
60  typename DistArray<Tile>::const_iterator end = array.end();
61 
62  for (; it != end; ++it) {
63  // Get tile matrix location info
64  const typename DistArray<Tile>::value_type tile = *it;
65 
66  // Get tile range data
67  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tile_lower = tile.range().lobound_data();
68  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tile_extent = tile.range().extent_data();
69  const std::size_t tile_lower_0 = tile_lower[0];
70  const std::size_t tile_lower_1 = tile_lower[1];
71  const std::size_t tile_extent_0 = tile_extent[0];
72  const std::size_t tile_extent_1 = tile_extent[1];
73 
74  // Create Eigen RowMajor Map of tile
75  const Eigen::Map<
76  const Eigen::Matrix<T, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
77  Eigen::AutoAlign>
78  eig_row_map = eigen_map(tile, tile_extent_0, tile_extent_1);
79 
80  // Create ColMajor EigenMatrix from RowMajor Map
81  Eigen::Matrix<T, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic> CMatrix = eig_row_map;
82 
83  // Make Elemental local matrix and attach the data.
84  elem::Matrix<T> ElemBlock;
85  ElemBlock.Attach(CMatrix.rows(), CMatrix.cols(), CMatrix.data(),
86  CMatrix.rows());
87 
88  // Attach elem local matrix to elem global matrix
89  interface.Axpy(1.0, ElemBlock, tile_lower_0, tile_lower_1);
90  }
91  interface.Detach(); // Does communication using elemental
92 
93  return mat;
94 }
95 
96 template <typename Tile>
97 void elem_to_array(DistArray<Tile>& array,
98  elem::DistMatrix<typename Tile::value_type>& mat) {
99  using T = typename Tile::value_type;
100  TA_USER_ASSERT(
101  array.range().rank() == 2u,
102  "TiledArray::elem_to_array(): requires the array to have dimension 2");
103  TA_USER_ASSERT(
104  (array.trange().elements_range().extent()[0] == mat.Height()) &&
105  (array.trange().elements_range().extent()[1] == mat.Width()),
106  "TiledArray::elem_to_array(): requires the shape of the elem matrix and "
107  "the array to be the same.");
108 
109  // Make interface and attach mat
110  elem::AxpyInterface<T> interface;
111  interface.Attach(elem::GLOBAL_TO_LOCAL, mat);
112 
113  // Get iterators to array
114  typename DistArray<Tile>::iterator it = array.begin();
115  typename DistArray<Tile>::iterator end = array.end();
116 
117  // Loop over tiles and improperly assign the data to them in column major
118  // format.
119  for (; it != end; ++it) {
120  // Get tile matrix location info
121  typename DistArray<Tile>::value_type tile = *it;
122 
123  // Get tile range data
124  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tile_lower = tile.range().lobound_data();
125  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tile_extent = tile.range().extent_data();
126  const std::size_t tile_lower_0 = tile_lower[0];
127  const std::size_t tile_lower_1 = tile_lower[1];
128  const std::size_t tile_extent_0 = tile_extent[0];
129  const std::size_t tile_extent_1 = tile_extent[1];
130 
131  // Make Elemental local matrix and attach the data.
132  elem::Matrix<T> ElemBlock;
133  ElemBlock.Attach(tile_extent_0, tile_extent_1, tile.data(), tile_extent_0);
134 
135  // need to zero tile so Axpy doesn't add to it.
136  std::fill(ElemBlock.Buffer(),
137  ElemBlock.Buffer() + tile_extent_0 * tile_extent_1, 0.0);
138 
139  // Attach elem local matrix to elem global matrix
140  interface.Axpy(1.0, ElemBlock, tile_lower_0, tile_lower_1);
141  }
142  interface.Detach(); // Does communication using elemental
143 
144  // now we have to go back and fix it so the tiles are row major ordered.
145  it = array.begin();
146  for (; it != end; ++it) {
147  // Get tile and size
148  typename DistArray<Tile>::value_type tile = *it;
149 
150  // Get tile range data
151  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tile_extent = tile.range().extent_data();
152  const std::size_t tile_extent_0 = tile_extent[0];
153  const std::size_t tile_extent_1 = tile_extent[1];
154 
155  // copy to row major matrix
156  Eigen::Matrix<T, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor> row_mat =
157  Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<T, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic>,
158  Eigen::AutoAlign>(tile.data(), tile_extent_0, tile_extent_1);
159 
160  // Finally copy the data back into the tile in the correct format.
161  std::copy(row_mat.data(), row_mat.data() + row_mat.size(), tile.data());
162  }
163 }
164 
165 } // namespace TiledArray

172 #pragma clang diagnostic push
173 #pragma clang diagnostic ignored "-Wtautological-compare"
174 #endif // __clang__

179 #pragma clang diagnostic pop
180 #endif // __clang__
